message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you this product. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $150.
Alice, that's a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for around $60.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $60. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
Thanks for countering, Alice.  I can't quite make $110 work, but how about $75? That's a pretty significant jump on my end.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, $75 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to compromise at $125, which is closer to my minimum price.
